summary: Polygon Drawing Feature testing completed successfully. All 32 Fincas tests pass including 11 new polygon drawing tests. Backend SIGPAC tests: 9/9 pass. The new feature allows users to draw polygons manually on the map to define parcels visually, with automatic area calculation in hectares.
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created. Tests use existing fincas data.
context_for_next_testing_agent:
Polygon Drawing Feature is fully tested and working. New tests added to fincas.spec.ts cover:

1. 'Dibujar Parcela' button visibility and functionality
2. Drawing map opens with green header 'Dibujar Parcela en Mapa'
3. Button text toggles between 'Dibujar Parcela' and 'Ocultar Dibujo'
4. Leaflet Draw tools visible (.leaflet-draw selector)
5. Layer selector works in drawing mode
6. Expand/Reduce button works (Ampliar/Reducir)
7. Close button hides the drawing map
8. Drawing polygon shows 'Parcela Dibujada' info panel with:
   - Polígonos count
   - Área Total in hectares
   - Vértices count
9. 'Limpiar' button (btn-clear-drawings testid) clears all drawings
10. Green indicator shows 'Parcela dibujada manualmente' when map hidden with drawn parcel
11. Hectáreas field updates automatically when polygon is drawn

Key testids used:
- btn-dibujar-parcela (toggle drawing map)
- btn-clear-drawings (clear all drawings)
- btn-editar-dibujo (edit existing drawing)
- mapa-sigpac-container (map container)
- select-map-layer (layer dropdown)
- btn-toggle-expand-map (fullscreen toggle)
- btn-close-map (close drawing map)

backend_endpoints: GET /api/sigpac/provincias - List Spanish provinces with SIGPAC codes
GET /api/sigpac/usos - Dictionary of SIGPAC land use codes
GET /api/sigpac/consulta - Query external SIGPAC API for parcel data
frontend_features: Dibujar Parcela button opens drawing map
Parcela Dibujada info panel (polígonos, área, vértices)
Hectáreas form field auto-updates with calculated area
Green indicator when map hidden with drawn parcel
